alert.note: Alert for Inland Volusia; Northern Lake County; Orange; Seminole (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 09 at 1:32PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Seminole, east central Lake, northwestern Orange and central Volusia Counties through 215 PM EDT... At 132 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Deltona to near Apopka. Movement was northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Deltona, Sanford, Apopka, DeLand and Eustis. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or hard-topped vehicle. Remember, when thunder roars, go indoors!

area.areaDesc: Inland Volusia; Northern Lake County; Orange; Seminole
